K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:101b-0: @101b dpal lha mo sgra dbyangs la bstod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:101b-1: lam gang gis na sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:101b-2: rgyal ba sras bcas chos kyi bla mar gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:101b-3: mkhyen pa'i rim par sa rnams bkod pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:101b-4: shes rab dkyil 'khor mang la skyabs su mchi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:101b-5: phyag 'tshal dpal ldan lha mo dbyangs can ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:101b-6: 'jig rten khams 'dir smra la dbang brnyes shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:101b-7: drang srong rig gsum rig pa'i pha rol gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102a-2: sems can don phyir 'phrin las chen po'i khur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102a-3: spro bar dka' ba kun kyang khyod kyis mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102a-4: sa dang pha rol phyin pa bcu spyad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102a-5: dge ba'i tshogs brtan yid bzhin las su bsgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102a-6: zhal gyi dkyil 'khor zla ba dri med rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102a-7: thugs rje'i spyan gyis 'gro ba'i mig byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102a-8: dus ring 'jig rten kun la bde bar gzigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102a-9: de la dbang po tshangs sogs shin tu 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102a-10: byams shing bzod ldan snying rje bskyed pa'i ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102a-11: lha mo mchog de 'gro kun skyong bar dgyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102a-12: thor tshugs ri bo rtse 'dra spobs pa 'phags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102a-13: shes rab zab cing shes pa'i rten byed kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102a-14: rig pa'i gnas la mnga' brnyes tshig gi bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102a-15: 'jig rten na yang lha yi lhar gyur la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102a-16: sdug bsngal bsal bar rab brtson gnyen mchog pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102a-17: mu su rtog ge ba rnams kun kyang 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102a-18: yan lag rnam par 'byes shing gsung snyan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102a-19: yon tan dri med bsod nams 'bar bar bsgyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102a-20: rig pa mchog gi dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102a-21: blo myur tshig 'chang spobs pa'i mchog stsol cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102a-22: sems can kun la rtag tu phan sems pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102a-23: mi bslu mchog khyod rnam grol sa la bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102a-24: thugs dam brtan bcas bskul ba rnams la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102a-25: dpal gyis dgongs shig don kun nye bar skongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102a-26: 'di ltar 'jig rten dag na snang ba kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102a-27: sgra 'joms khyad par tshig gis don mtshon te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102b-0: @102b phan tshun shes shing yang dag brda sprod pa'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102b-1: dbyangs can khyod kyi mthu ste bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102b-2: gzungs dang chos kyi stobs la dbang brnyes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102b-3: dam tshig bden grub drang srong shes nyen can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102b-4: lus sems ngag rnams byin gyis rlob pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102b-5: yid 'ong sgras kyang 'jig rten tshim par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102b-6: byang chub mchog gi spyod phyir su dag mos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102b-7: bdag dang gzhan don phun sum tshogs 'gyur ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102b-8: lus dang ngag yid rnam dag mchog 'dod la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102b-9: bcom ldan 'das mas rtag tu don mchog stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102b-10: bdag ni dpa' zhing byang chub lam brtson dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102b-11: lce yi dbang po dag cing tshig btsun la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102b-12: rig pa'i gter ldan smra la thogs med dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102b-13: bde gshegs spobs pa nye bar sgrub tu gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102b-14: rig pa'i yum gyi rang bzhin rtog las bden //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102b-15: snyan pa'i rgyal mtshan dga' ba'i shugs kyis bskyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102b-16: mkha' la sna tshogs rnam par dri 'dod ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102b-17: mtshan nyid rtogs dka' yon tan gting mtha' med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102b-18: na mo bha ga wa te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102b-20: na ma: sva ra sva tyee de bi siddhya ntu mantra p'a da tam bra hm'a nu mantra sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-021:102b-21: dpal lha mo sgra dbyangs la bstod pa rdzogs so ////
